title: Pixel 3 won't turn on
content:
Hi,

I woke up this morning and saw a message on my screen "your phone is corrupted". Pressed the power button, saw the google logo for 2 seconds and then.. Nothing. Unable to turn on my phone, go into recovery etc. It's a black screen and it doesn't respond on anything.

I've seen a lot of issues on this forum. What can we do?
